column2: Meribor. Live now; make now always the most precious time. Now will never come again.

column1: If there's nothing wrong with me... maybe there's something wrong with the universe! - Dr. Beverly Crusher
There are four lights! - Captain Jean-Luc Picard

Laws change depending on who's making them, but justice is justice. - Odo

column1: Live long and prosper - Spock
Once you have their money, you never give it back. - FROA 1
Never spend more for an acquisition than you have to. - FROA 3
Never allow family to stand in the way of profit. - FROA 6
Keep your ears open. - FROA 7
Opportunity plus instinct equals profit. - FROA 9
Greed is eternal. - FROA 10
A deal is a deal. - FROA 16
A contract is a contract is a contract (but only between Ferengi). - FROA 17
A Ferengi without profit is no Ferengi at all. - FROA 18
Never place friendship above profit. - FROA 21
A wise man can hear profit in the wind. - FROA 22
Nothing is more important than your health ... except for your money. - FROA 23
Never make fun of a Ferengi's mother. - FROA 31
It never hurts to suck up to the boss. - FROA 33
War is good for business. - FROA 34
Peace is good for business. - FROA 35
Expand or die. - FROA 45
Don't trust a man wearing a better suit than your own. - FROA 47
The bigger the smile, the sharper the knife. - FROA 48
Good customers are as rare as latinum; treasure them. - FROA 57
Free advice is seldom cheap. - FROA 59
The riskier the road, the greater the profit. - FROA 62
Knowledge equals profit. - FROA 74
Home is where the heart is, but the stars are made of latinum. - FROA 75
Every once in a while, declare peace. It confuses the hell out of your enemies. - FROA 76
Females and finances don't mix. - FROA 94
Expand or die. - FROA 95
Every man has his price. - FROA 98
Nature decays, but latinum lasts forever. - FROA 102
Dignity and an empty sack is worth the sack. - FROA 109
Treat people in your debt like family: exploit them. - FROA 111
Never have sex with the boss's sister. - FROA 112
You can't make a deal if you're dead. - FROA 125
Wives serve, brothers inherit. - FROA 139
Whisper your way to success. - FROA 168
Hear all, trust nothing. - FROA 190
It's always good business to know about new customers before they walk in your door. - FROA 194
New customers are like razor-toothed gree worms; they can be succulent, but sometimes they bite back. - FROA 203
Sometimes the only thing more dangerous than a question is an answer. - FROA 208
Employees are the rungs on the ladder of success. Don't hesitate to step on them. - FROA 211
Never begin a business negotiation on an empty stomach. - FROA 214
You can't free a fish from water. - FROA 217
Latinum lasts longer than lust. - FROA 229
Never be afraid to mislabel a product. - FROA 239
Never allow doubt to tarnish your lust for latinum. - FROA 263
No good deed ever goes unpunished. - FROA 285
Computers make excellent and efficient servants, but I have no wish to serve under them. - Spock
Insufficient facts always invite danger. - Spock
In critical moments, men sometimes see exactly what they wish to see. - Spock
After a time, you may find that having is not so pleasing a thing after all as wanting. - Spock
Without followers, evil cannot spread. - Spock
When you eliminate the impossible, whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth. - Spock
Live long and prosper. - Spock
The needs of the many outweigh the needs of the few. - Spock
